{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3649722,"name":"","username":"senditmel","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/e19adc/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-06-09T18:49:44.521Z","cooked":"

For an offseason project, I wanted to work on our robot’s vision system, and I took home

2 of these lidars(HOKUYO Scanner | Schmersal USA/Canada)

1 of these lidars(RPLIDAR-A1 360°Laser Range Scanner _ Domestic Laser Range Scanner|SLAMTEC)

and also one of these radars(SS400/SS400U OEM Speed Sensor Doppler Radar - Houston Radar)

I was curious which you would recommend for robot positioning, piece detection, robot detection, or any other cool things that could be done with them. Also, if anyone has experience with these systems electrically and/or software-wise, any help would be greatly appreciated.

FYI I have a RbPI5

Houston Radar","clicks":8},{"url":"https://www.slamtec.com/en/lidar/a1","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"RPLIDAR-A1 360°Laser Range Scanner _ Domestic Laser Range Scanner|SLAMTEC","clicks":7}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":75132,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/for-an-offseason-project-i-took-home-a-couple-donated-lidar-systems-along-with-a-radar-system/502974/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3649750,"name":"Karl Olson","username":"olsonkarlp","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/o/b9bd4f/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-06-09T19:44:16.247Z","cooked":"

IMO, in the context of localization (not piece detection, etc.):

senditmel:

of these lidars

10 Hz is pretty slow for localization

senditmel:

and also one of these radars

from the tech manual: Accuracy: 0.5% of reading + 0.1mph
0.1 mph in FRC relevant units is almost 2 inches per second. On top of that, this only measures velocity, which you would have to integrate, leading to further errors. Also the manual indicates it might have problems at “slow” car speeds which are the top end of FRC bots.

senditmel:

2 of these lidars

Remember R301

There is probably something there with game piece or robot detection with the “slow” lidar, or lidar as a contributor to localization with higher rate updates from another system.

It’s hard to beat a camera and AprilTags, especially with the amazing software support from Limelight or Photonvision.

olsonkarlp:

10 Hz is pretty slow for localization

I agree. We found problems even with 20ms delay or less with the limelight during rapid acceleration and at high speeds
